name: Paracetamol
description: Used to treat pain and fever.

name: Ibuprofen
description: Nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug (NSAID) used to reduce fever and treat pain or inflammation.

name: Acetylsalicylic Acid
description: NSAID used to reduce pain, fever, or inflammation.

name: Metformin
description: Oral diabetes medicine that helps control blood sugar levels.

name: Atorvastatin
description: Statin medication used to prevent cardiovascular disease and treat abnormal lipid levels.

name: Ramipril
description: ACE inhibitor used to treat high blood pressure and congestive heart failure.

name: Amlodipine
description: Calcium channel blocker used to treat high blood pressure and coronary artery disease.

name: Omeprazole
description: Proton pump inhibitor used to treat gastroesophageal reflux disease and peptic ulcers.

name: Pantoprazole
description: Proton pump inhibitor used for short-term treatment of erosion and ulceration of the esophagus.

name: Simvastatin
description: Statin medication used to control hypercholesterolemia and prevent cardiovascular disease.

name: Lisinopril
description: ACE inhibitor used to treat high blood pressure and heart failure.

name: Losartan
description: Angiotensin II receptor antagonist used to treat high blood pressure.

name: Bisoprolol
description: Beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure and heart-related chest pain.

name: Metoprolol
description: Beta-blocker used to treat high blood pressure, chest pain, and heart failure.

name: Clopidogrel
description: Antiplatelet medication used to reduce the risk of heart disease and stroke.

name: Salbutamol
description: Short-acting β₂-adrenergic receptor agonist used to relieve bronchospasm in conditions such as asthma.

name: Fluticasone
description: Steroid used to prevent asthma attacks.

name: Amoxicillin
description: Antibiotic used to treat a number of bacterial infections.

name: Ciprofloxacin
description: Antibiotic used to treat a variety of bacterial infections.

name: Azithromycin
description: Antibiotic used to treat various types of infections.

name: Levothyroxine
description: Hormone replacement used to treat hypothyroidism.

name: Insulin Glargine
description: Long-acting insulin used to treat type 1 and type 2 diabetes.

name: Insulin Aspart
description: Rapid-acting insulin used to improve blood sugar control in diabetes.

name: Warfarin
description: Anticoagulant used to prevent blood clots.

name: Rivaroxaban
description: Anticoagulant used to treat and prevent blood clots.

name: Apixaban
description: Anticoagulant used to reduce the risk of stroke and blood clots.

name: Dabigatran
description: Anticoagulant used to prevent strokes and blood clots.

name: Hydrochlorothiazide
description: Diuretic used to treat high blood pressure and swelling due to fluid build-up.

name: Furosemide
description: Diuretic used to treat fluid build-up due to heart failure, liver scarring, or kidney disease.

name: Spironolactone
description: Diuretic used to treat fluid retention in conditions such as heart failure.

name: Allopurinol
description: Used to reduce uric acid levels in gout and certain types of kidney stones.

name: Colchicine
description: Used to prevent or treat gout attacks.

name: Methotrexate
description: Used to treat cancer, autoimmune diseases, and ectopic pregnancies.

name: Prednisolone
description: Steroid used to treat inflammation and autoimmune conditions.

name: Alendronic Acid
description: Bisphosphonate used to treat osteoporosis and other bone diseases.

name: Risedronic Acid
description: Used to strengthen bones and treat osteoporosis.

name: Esomeprazole
description: Proton pump inhibitor used to treat acid reflux.

name: Lansoprazole
description: Proton pump inhibitor used to treat stomach ulcers.

name: Duloxetine
description: Used to treat depression and anxiety.

name: Sertraline
description: Used to treat depression, OCD, and anxiety disorders.

name: Citalopram
description: Used to treat depression and panic disorder.

name: Escitalopram
description: Used to treat depression and generalized anxiety disorder.

name: Venlafaxine
description: Used to treat depression and anxiety disorders.

name: Olanzapine
description: Antipsychotic used to treat schizophrenia and bipolar disorder.

name: Risperidone
description: Antipsychotic used to treat schizophrenia and bipolar disorder.

name: Quetiapine
description: Antipsychotic used to treat schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, and depression.

name: Lorazepam
description: Benzodiazepine used to treat anxiety and sleep disorders.

name: Diazepam
description: Benzodiazepine used to treat anxiety, muscle spasms, and seizures.

name: Zolpidem
description: Used to treat insomnia.

name: Levocetirizine
description: Antihistamine used to treat allergies.
